items.title: Nifty creates history: Hits 59th new high in 2024, most no of times in a yr
items.description: The NSE Nifty had hit 58 record highs in calendar year 2021. Additionally, the index has rallied on an average 27% from its calendar year lows in the last 5 years; and is up 21% thus far this year.
